text: The Governor of Utah is the head of the executive branch of Utah's state governmentUT Const. art. VII, § 5 and the commander-in-chief of its military forces.UT Const. art. VII, § 4 ==List of governors== (11) (6) Governor Governor Governor Governor Term of office Party TermEach term for which a governor is elected is listed here; if multiple governors served in a single term, due to resignations, deaths, and the like, then that term will be shared among those governors. If a governor was elected multiple times, then there will be multiple terms listed for that governor. Previous office Lt.
